2025-09-29.content: VPC Service Controls support for Cloud Scheduler jobs has been extended to Google Cloud APIs that are VPC Service Controls-compliant. For more information, see [Secure cron jobs with VPC Service Controls](https://cloud.google.com/scheduler/docs/secure-with-vpcsc).

summary.title: VPC SC Support Extended for Cloud Scheduler
summary.summary: VPC Service Controls now support Cloud Scheduler jobs for Google Cloud APIs that are compliant with VPC Service Controls.
